Room.Name: Nagaritha Drive
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Nagaritha Drive, east of Lankshire Parkway.
Room.LongDescription: You can barely see Lankshire Parkway intersecting Nagaritha Drive to the west. On the south side of the road are the Klondike Wheat Fields. The management of the fields is always on the lookout for unskilled labor that they can exploit. The entrance to the fields is located off of Lankshire Parkway.
